nodes.text: The Garwian Unity was a united political entity of the Garwian species located inside the Unknown Regions of the galaxy.

Chiss Senior Captain Mitth'raw'nuruodo once assisted the Garwian Unity in battle, believing the assistance to be purely defensive in nature. However, the assistance also proved to be offensive, much to the chagrin of Thrawn and Ziara.
The Ruleri was the ruling supreme body of the Garwian Unity, acting as a legislature as well.
The Garwian Unity had a military that defended it interests, which was composed of a group of officers. Second Defense Overlord was a position within the military.

The Garwian Unity controlled areas of space beyond the borders of the known-galaxy from Solitair, the Unity capital-world, which had several colonies, including Stivic, that was a major commerce world of the Garwian Unity.
